AuthorDetails.Name: Jacob Overgaard
AuthorDetails.Description: Jacob works for Umbraco HQ on the CMS team. He is a developer and loves to work with JavaScript and Umbraco. He is also a big fan of the Umbraco community and loves to contribute to the community in any way he can.

Description: Lexicon restores dictionary-based backoffice localization for Umbraco 14+. Use dictionary items to translate document type labels, descriptions, tab names, and group names in the backoffice.
Title: Lexicon

Screenshots.Caption: Create dictionary items with Area_Key format
Reference dictionary keys in document type labels
Editors see translated values in the content editor
